蔮字的基本解释

蔮
guó
古同“帼”。

蔮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guó］
［《廣韻》古對切，去隊，見。］
同“幗1”。
古代妇女覆于发上的首饰。

蔮字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔮； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第27
【唐韻】古對切，音憒。【儀禮·士冠禮註】頍，緇布冠無筓者，滕、薛名蔮爲頍。【後漢·輿服志】翦氂蔮，簪珥。【註】簪以玳瑁爲擿，長一尺，左右一橫簪以安蔮結。

蔮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蔮字的起名意思

暂无。

蔮
Basic explanation of words
蔮
guó
Gu Tong "帼".
蔮
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guó］
["Guangyun" ancient cut, go to the team, see you. ]
Same as "帼1".
Jewelry that ancient women covered their hair.
蔮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蔮; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 27
[Tang Yun] Ancient cut, the sound is stunned. [Notes on Ceremony and Shiguan Ceremony] Moss, those without a cloth crown, Teng and Xue Mingxue are Moss. [Later Han·Yufu Zhi] 翦綦蔮,簪珥. [Note] The hairpin is made of tortoiseshell, it is one foot long, and there is a horizontal hairpin on the left and right to secure the knot.
